data.text: Din pa yɛ sen aduhuam papa,
Eye sɛ obi bɛkɔ ayi ase
Awerɛhow ye sen ɔserew,
Onyansafo koma wɔ ayi ase,
Eye sɛ wobetie onyansafo animka
Sɛnea nsɔe turuturuw wɔ ɔsɛn ase no
Asisi ma onyansafo dan ɔkwasea,
Asɛm awiei ye sen ne mfiase,
Mma wo koma nsɔre ntɛmntɛm,
Nka se, “Adɛn nti na tete nna no ye sen nnɛ mmere yi?”
Nimdeɛ, ɛyɛ ade pa sɛ agyapade ara pɛ,
Sɛnea nimdeɛ yɛ bammɔ no,
Dwene nea Onyankopɔn ayɛ ho:
Mmere pa mu, ma wʼani nnye;
Me nkwanna a ɛyɛ ahuhude yi mu, mahu nneɛma abien:
Nyɛ wo ho ɔtreneeni ntra so,
Nyɛ omumɔyɛfo ntra so,
Eye sɛ wubeso baako no mu den
Nimdeɛ ma onyansafo baako tumi bebree
Onipa treneeni biara nni asase so a
Mfa nea nnipa ka nyinaa nyɛ asɛm,
na wunim wɔ wo koma sɛ
Mede nimdeɛ asɔ eyinom nyinaa ahwɛ, na mekae se,
Sɛnea nimdeɛ te biara,
Afei meyɛɛ mʼadwene sɛ mɛte ase,
Mahu nea ɛyɛ nwene sen owu;
Ɔsɛnkafo no se, “Hwɛ eyi ne nea mahwehwɛ ahu:
mereyɛ nhwehwɛmu,
Eyi nko ara na mahu:
